title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 225.3 - Applicability of rules
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 225.3 - Applicability of rules

State Regulations

The rules, as now in effect, and as hereinafter amended, from time to time, shall apply, in appropriate part or parts, to all persons, agencies, facilities, institutions, associations and organizations, incorporated or not incorporated, public or private, which are subject to the
visitation, inspection and supervision or the board, or which are otherwise
subject to the jurisdiction of the board. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
225.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
